data_table.description: Lipid Traits (fractions, particles, size, etc), Offspring Cohort Exams 4, 5

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: CHYLO
variable.description: CHYLOMICRON PARTICLES SIZE > 220 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP6
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 150+/-70 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP5
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 70+/-10 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP4
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 50+/-10 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP3
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 38+/-3 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP2
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 33+/-2 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLP1
variable.description: VLDL PARTICLES SIZE 29+/-2 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: IDLP
variable.description: IDL PARTICLES 25+/-2 NM (EXPRESSED AS TG CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: LDLP3
variable.description: LDL PARTICLES 22+/-0.7 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: LDLP2
variable.description: LDL PARTICLES 20.5+/-0.7 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: LDLP1
variable.description: LDL PARTICLES 19+/-0.7 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLP5
variable.description: HDL PARTICLES 11.5+/-1.5 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLP4
variable.description: HDL PARTICLES 9.4+/-0.6 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLP3
variable.description: HDL PARTICLES 8.5+/-0.3 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLP2
variable.description: HDL PARTICLES 8.0+/-0.2 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLP1
variable.description: HDL PARTICLES 7.5+/-0.2 NM (EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL) AND DETERMINED USING NMR, EXAM 4

variable.name: VLDLSZ
variable.description: WEIGHTED AVERAGE FOR VLDL SIZE BASED ON MEASUREMENTS OF VLDLP1 THROUGH VLDLP6, EXAM 4

variable.name: LDLSZ
variable.description: WEIGHTED AVERAGE FOR LDL SIZE BASED ON MEASUREMENTS OF LDLP1 THROUGH LDLP6, EXAM 4

variable.name: HDLSZ
variable.description: WEIGHTED AVERAGE FOR HDL SIZE BASED ON MEASUREMENTS OF HDLP1 THROUGH HDLP6, EXAM 4

variable.name: APOCIIIT
variable.description: APOLIPOPROTEIN CIII CONCENTRATION DETERMINED USING NEPHELOMETRIC ASSAY FROM WACO (MG/DL), EXAM 5

variable.name: APOA14
variable.description: APOLIPOPROTEIN AI CONCENTRATION USING ELISA (MG/DL), EXAM 4

variable.name: APOB4
variable.description: APOLIPOPPROTEIN B CONCENTRATION USING ELISA (MG/DL), EXAM 4

variable.name: RLP_C
variable.description: REMNANT LIKE PARTICLES MEASURED USING SELECTIVE IMMUNOSEPARATION OF LIPOPROTEINS USING THE OTSHUKA KIT. EXPRESSED AS CHOLESTEROL IN MG/DL, EXAM 4

variable.name: RLP_TG
variable.description: REMNANT LIKE PARTICLES MEASURED USING SELECTIVE IMMUNOSEPARATION OF LIPOPROTEINS USING THE OTSHUKA KIT. EXPRESSED AS TRIGLYCERIDES IN MG/DL, EXAM 4

variable.name: APOESER5
variable.description: APOE CONCENTRATIONS IN MG/DL USING IMMUNOCHEMICAL TECHNIQUE BY SERVIA, EXAM 5
